full_summary:
====================================

**Solicitation Information**

* **Competition Title:** TBIPS - I.9 System Administrator
* **Alternate Title (French):** SPICT - I.9 Administrateur de systèmes
* **Solicitation Number:** NRCan-5000074105

**Posting and Closing Information**

* **Posting Date:** June 13, 2023
* **Closing Date:** August 7, 2023 at 2:00 PM ET

**Tender Details**

* **Amendment:** 9 (see attached amendment notice for details)
* **Status:** Cancelled (not subject to further tender action)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Trade Agreements**

* The procurement is covered by the following trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

**Contracting Entity**

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Natural Resources Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, ON K1A0E4
* **Contact Person:**
	+ Danielle Chiasson
	+ danielle.chiasson@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
	+ (902) 476-7148

**Contract Requirements**

* The proposed contract is for the provision of Information Technology (IT) management services, specifically the administration of system infrastructure and management of IT operations.
* Bidders must ensure they have the required qualifications, experience, and certifications for the services being offered.

**Additional Information**

* A detailed solicitation package, including tender guidelines and appendices, can be found at the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6379/npp-tbips-nrcan-5000074105-%28e.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6379/npp-tbips-nrcan-5000074105-%28e.pdf) for English and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6379/apm-spict-nrcan
